meanings.definition: Having or displaying a friendly and pleasant manner.
meanings.sent1: She greeted everyone with an amiable smile.
meanings.sent2: The amiable neighbor always waved hello.
meanings.sent3: The amiable puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The sun cast an amiable glow over the peaceful meadow.
meanings.sent5: His amiable nature made him a favorite among his colleagues.

meanings.sent1: The amiable weather made the picnic enjoyable.

meanings.sent3: The amiable scent of fresh flowers lifted her spirits.
meanings.sent4: The amiable colors of the painting brought a sense of calm.
meanings.sent5: The amiable atmosphere of the party put everyone at ease.

meanings.sent1: Her amiable nature made it easy to approach her.
meanings.sent2: The amiable conversation flowed smoothly between them.
meanings.sent3: The amiable gesture of offering a seat was appreciated.
